_header: Young and old learneth this lore

BLHar3810.First Lines: Ȝoung & olde lerneth this loreþat cast to have endeles lyfe…
BLHar3810.Last Lines: …martres & virgynes þer wolde not schoneþe fryday for to fast & pray
BLHar3810.Editions:
Jordan,  Richard. 
             “Kleinere Dichtungen der Handschrfit Harley 3810.” 
             Englische Studien
         41 (1910): 253-66: 262-5.
